headline: Payments firm Corpay signs $2.2 billion deal for UK's Alpha Group
summary: Alpha provides alternative bank accounts to European-based investment managers to fund their investments and pay expenses.  The deal will provide Corpay a runway to expand those relationships into the U.S. and Asia, adding heft to its global reach.  Alpha shareholders will receive 4,250 pence per share, representing a 55% premium to the closing price on May 1.

headline: Corpay to Acquire Alpha Group, a B2B Cross Border FX Company
summary: ATLANTA, July 23, 2025--Corpay, Inc. (NYSE: CPAY), the corporate payments company, today announced it has reached agreement on the terms of a recommended cash acquisition of Alpha Group International plc (LSE: ALPH) ("Alpha"). The acquisition values Alpha at an enterprise valuation of approximately $2.2 billion (£1.6 billion).
